questions.title: 汤姆懂得而不至于犯这样愚蠢的错误。
questions.answer: Tom knows better than to make such a foolish mistake.

questions.title: 你应该懂得而不至于去嘲笑一个残疾人。
questions.answer: You should know better than to make fun of a disabled.

questions.title: 你应该知道而不至于去轻信一个小人。
questions.answer: You should know better than to readily believe a black man.

questions.title: 汤姆很明白而不至于去打他的妻子。
questions.answer: Tom certainly knows better than to spank his wife.

questions.title: 我的小女儿懂得而不至于爱上这样一个穷小子。
questions.answer: My youngest daughter knows better than to fall in love with such a poorboy.

questions.title: 在这样的夜晚，她不至于连不宜单独外出也不知道。
questions.answer: She knows better than to go alone on such a night.

title: ——我应该懂得而不至于打破我妈妈心爱的花瓶。
——还有补救的机会。

answer.en: I should know better than to break my mother's beloved vase.
There is another chance to save it.

title: ——那个电影明星懂得而不至于在公共场所骂那个记者。
——这是一个愚蠢的行为。

answer.en: That film star knows better than to scold a media in public.

title: ——搜索队应该明白而不至于走错路。
——他们正尽最大的努力寻找出口。

answer.en: The search party should know better than to go the wrong way.
They are trying their best to find the exit.
